unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Level Up Your Insta Game, Yaar!**
normalised: Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Level Up Your Insta Game, Yaar!

unnormalised: Are your Instagram reels flopping faster than a Mumbai local train on a rainy day? Time to ditch the guesswork and get serious about follower analytics! Gone are the days of just throwing content at the wall and hoping something sticks.
normalised: Are your Instagram reels flopping faster than a Mumbai local train on a rainy day? Time to ditch the guesswork and get serious about follower analytics! Gone are the days of just throwing content at the wall and hoping something sticks.

unnormalised: Experts like Pooja Sharma, a leading social media guru from IIM Ahmedabad, are saying that understanding your audience is key. Forget just counting likes, dive deep into engagement rates, follower demographics (are they mostly from Delhi or Chennai?), and the best times to post (apparently 3 PM on Tuesdays are golden, but test it out!).
normalised: Experts like Pooja Sharma, a leading social media guru from I I M Ahmedabad, are saying that understanding your audience is key. Forget just counting likes, dive deep into engagement rates, follower demographics (are they mostly from Delhi or Chennai?), and the best times to post (apparently three P M on Tuesdays are golden, but test it out!).

unnormalised: New tools are popping up faster than pani puri stalls on Linking Road, offering detailed reports and insights. Think of it as your digital kundli, revealing the secrets to social media success. This Diwali, don't just light diyas, light up your follower engagement! Remember to track your progress from 01/01/2024. Early birds get the worm (or in this case, the followers!). Check your analytics at 11:11 AM for good luck. And seriously, stop posting blurry photos - it's 2024! Report due date: 30/06/2024.
